lessons.description: Click a button by name or label
Click at specific position within element
Click nth element in a list

lessons.pattern: const box = await page.locator('${selector}').boundingBox(); await page.mouse.click(box.x + box.width + 10, box.y);
await page.locator('${selector}').click({ force: true, trial: false });
lessons.description: Click through overlay to element beneath

lessons.pattern: const elements = await page.locator('${selector}').all(); for (const el of elements) { await el.click(); }

lessons.description: Conditional click only if element is visible

lessons.pattern: await page.locator('${selector}').click({ button: 'right' }); await page.getByText('${menu1}').hover(); await page.getByText('${menu2}').click();

lessons.description: Wait for context menu to appear
Verify context menu has specific option
Hover at specific position within element

lessons.pattern: await page.locator('${selector}').hover(); await page.mouse.down(); await page.mouse.move(${x}, ${y}); await page.mouse.up();

await page.keyboard.down('Control'); await page.locator('${selector1}').click(); await page.locator('${selector2}').click(); await page.keyboard.up('Control'); await page.locator('${selector1}').dragTo(page.locator('${target}'));
await page.locator('${selector}').hover(); await page.mouse.down(); await page.mouse.move(${x}, ${y}); await page.mouse.up();

lessons.description: Reorder items relative to each other

lessons.pattern: await page.locator('${selector}').hover(); await page.mouse.down(); await page.waitForTimeout(${delay}); await page.mouse.move(${x}, ${y}); await page.mouse.up();

const box = await page.locator('${selector}').boundingBox(); await page.locator('${selector}').hover(); await page.mouse.down(); await page.mouse.move(box.x + ${dx}, box.y + ${dy}); await page.mouse.up();
await page.locator('${selector}').focus(); await page.keyboard.press('Space'); await page.keyboard.press('ArrowDown'); await page.keyboard.press('Space');

lessons.description: Wait for drag operation to complete

lessons.pattern: await page.waitForFunction(() => { let lastPos = window.scrollY; return new Promise(resolve => { const check = () => { const currentPos = window.scrollY; if (lastPos === currentPos) resolve(true); else { lastPos = currentPos; setTimeout(check, 100); } }; check(); }); });
const box = await page.locator('${selector}').boundingBox(); await page.touchscreen.tap(box.x + box.width / 2, box.y + box.height / 2); await page.mouse.move(box.x + ${endX}, box.y + ${endY});
await page.touchscreen.tap(${x1}, ${y1}); await page.touchscreen.tap(${x2}, ${y2}); await page.mouse.move(${newX1}, ${newY1});
await page.touchscreen.tap(${x1}, ${y1}); await page.waitForTimeout(${delay}); await page.touchscreen.tap(${x2}, ${y2});
await page.keyboard.press('Tab'); const focused = await page.evaluate(() => document.activeElement); await expect(page.locator('${container}')).toContainElement(focused);
const activeEl = await page.evaluate(() => document.activeElement); await expect(page.locator('${container}')).toContainElement(activeEl);
const focused = await page.evaluate(() => document.activeElement); await expect(page.locator('${selector}')).toBe(focused);

await expect(computedStyle).toBe('${value}');

lessons.pattern:
const pseudoContent = await page.locator('${selector}').evaluate((el) => window.getComputedStyle(el, '::${pseudo}').getPropertyValue('content'));
await expect(pseudoContent).toBe('"${content}"');

const animations = await page.locator('${selector}').evaluate((el) => el.getAnimations());
await expect(animations.length).toBeGreaterThan(0);

await expect(count).toBeGreaterThan(${count});

const count = await page.locator('${selector}').count();
await expect(count).toBeGreaterThan(0);

await expect(url.pathname).toBe('${pathname}');

lessons.pattern:

await expect(request).toBeTruthy();

lessons.pattern:

lessons.pattern:

await expect(response.headers()['${header}']).toBe('${value}');

lessons.pattern:

lessons.pattern: await context.addCookies([{ name: '${name}', value: '${value}', domain: '${domain}', path: '/' }]);

await page.evaluate('{ localStorage.clear(); sessionStorage.clear(); }');
await context.clearCookies();

await page.route('**/api/${endpoint}', route => route.fulfill({ status: ${statusCode}, body: '${message}' }));

await download.saveAs('${filePath}');

await download.cancel();

const download = await page.waitForEvent('download');
const url = download.url();

expect(position).toMatchObject({ lat: ${expectedLat}, lng: ${expectedLng} });

const context = await browser.newContext({ ...device });
await page.setViewportSize({ width: ${height}, height: ${width} }); // Swap width/height

const errors = [];
page.on('console', msg => { if (msg.type() === 'error') errors.push(msg.text()); });

const requestFailures = [];
page.on('requestfailed', request => requestFailures.push({ url: request.url(), failure: request.failure() }));

const logs = [];
page.on('console', msg => { if (msg.type() === '${type}') logs.push(msg.text()); });
